document_data.caption: Map showing the location of Massalan Villa (N14).
document_data.name: Massalan Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Massalan Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Massalan]].
document_data.Location: The villa was prominently located on the northeast corner of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and [[Delzorin Street]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]].
document_data.Structure: It consisted of a few unique one- and two-story buildings in a walled compound, with the main manor facing the [[Lanngolyn Villa]] across Delzorin Street.
